title.rendered: STEDI 30 WATT LED TRACTOR FLOOD LIGHT

content.rendered:
Our 30 Watt High Output Flood Light is the perfect workmate for conditions that require maximum light output. Supplied with both Universal U Bracket & Adjustable Side Bracket making it a versatile work light for any heavy machinery.

WIDE FLOODCREE LED

WORK ALL NIGHT

OVERVIEW

The 30w Tractor LED Flood light is fitted with both a U-Bracket and rear adjustable arm to fit all types of tractors including factory mounting locations whilst still maintaining full adjustability of positioning and angle.

PERFORMANCE

A dramatic increase over the factory halogen lighting up a wider area and an increased beam intensity allowing more visibility around your vehicle.

APPLICATION

These have a list of known compatibility with factory fittings but are also able to be installed at various locations around your vehicle. Not limited by tractor application as these are a useful companion to any work environment.

DETAILS

KEY TECHNICAL FEATURES

  • 40 Degree Flood Optics
  • 6 x CREE 5W LEDs
  • 6000K Colour Temp
  • Environmentally Sealed Deutsch Plugs
  • Lexan Poly carbonate

Side Bracket Compatible Models:
*Universal U Bracket will fit all Tractor makes & models*

Case IH:
– 5120 / 5130 / 5140
– 5220 / 5230 / 5240 / 5250
– 7110 / 7120 / 7130 / 7140
– 7210 / 7220 / 7230 / 7240 / 7250
– 8910 / 8920 / 8930 / 8940 / 8950
– MX100 / MX120 / MX135 / MX150 / MX170
– MX80C

Ford:
– New Holland 8670
– New Holland 8670a
– New Holland 8770
– New Holland 8770a
– New Holland 8870
– New Holland 8870a
– New Holland 8970
– New Holland 8970a

Massey:
– Ferguson 6235
– Ferguson 6245
– Ferguson 6255
– Ferguson 6265
– Ferguson 6270
– Ferguson 6280
– Ferguson 6290

Valtra:
– T and N Series (all models)

SPECIFICATIONS

POWER 30 Watts
LED CHIP 6 x 5 Watt High Intensity CREE
CURRENT DRAW 2.3a @ 13.6v
VOLTAGE 9 to 36v
RAW LUMENS 2988Lm
INGRESS PROTECTION IP68
COLOUR TEMPERATURE 6000k
LIFE SPAN 50,000hrs
LENS Lexan Polycarbonate
WEIGHT 1.100kg
BEAM TYPE FLOOD

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x High Output 30w CREE LED Light Flood Light
  • Stainless Steel Universal U Bracket
  • Stainless Steel Adjustable Side Bracket

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
